Build ID: 20110811165603

Steps to reproduce:

Hello, there is a graphical problem only if Adobe Dreamweaver CS 5.5 and Thunderbird 5 or 6 is startet on Mac OS 10.6 or 10.7.


Actual results:

If i reply a message, the message body and all other fields are empty, until i move the message window, then the body is filled up.


Expected results:

The message body should fully screen without moving the message window
